dcterms:creator: I. Sharafaldin
A.H. Lashkari
S. Hakak
A.A. Ghorbani
dcterms:description: CICDDoS2019 is a recent dataset that contains various types of DDoS attacks, specifically designed for evaluating intrusion detection systems. It includes 87 features and multiple classes of attacks, making it suitable for feature selection and classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CICDDoS2019

dcterms:creator: UNB Canadian Institute for Cybersecurity
dcterms:description: UNSW-NB15 is a widely used dataset for evaluating feature selection methods in intrusion detection systems. It contains a variety of attack types and is structured to facilitate multiclass classification.
dcterms:title: UNSW-NB15
